    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Developer Bazaar Technologies&#39; proactivity is highly positive. Clients frequently commend their responsiveness and willingness to adapt to feedback. For instance, one client highlighted their &#39;ongoing collaboration&#39; and quick adjustments to requests, while another noted their proactive approach in suggesting features that enhanced the project&#39;s value. Additionally, multiple reviews emphasized their ability to maintain clear communication and deliver on time, indicating a strong commitment to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations

        MindSea consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their excellent project management, timely delivery, and high-quality outcomes. One client noted, &#39;The end quality exceeded my expectations,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;MindSea went above and beyond.&#39; Their thorough processes and ability to adapt to client needs were also commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;They exceeded our expectations again.&#39; Overall, clients express strong satisfaction and a willingness to recommend MindSea for future projects.
      </p>

            >Jafton is a dedicated Mobile App Development company specializing in creating and enhancing mobile applications with a strong emphasis on performance, user experience, and integration. Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
              data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Jafton consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews praising their exceptional project management and ability to seamlessly integrate with client teams. Clients highlighted Jafton&#39;s quick understanding of their visions and proactive problem-solving. One CEO noted, &#34;Jafton exceeded our expectations in every way,&#34; while another stated, &#34;Their dedication and technical skills made the development process easy and efficient.&#34; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Jafton&#39;s performance and outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="292976"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974986"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Staff Aug & UI/UX Design for Digital Wishlist Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 5, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What impressed me most about Jafton was their quick understanding of our vision, seamless integration with our team, proactive problem-solving, and dedication to quality. Jafton exceeded our expectations; we have no suggestions for improvement.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/jafton/292976"
            title="View Jafton Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="912548"

<meta itemprop="position" content="5">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="907842"
    data-title="Roweb Development"

    
        data-position="655"
        data-type="Directory"
    
    
    itemprop="item"
    itemscope
    itemtype="https://schema.org/LocalBusiness"

<button
    type="button"
    name="bookmark"
    class="sg-shortlist-bookmark sg-shortlist-bookmark--default"
    data-shortlist-state="default"
    aria-label="Add to Shortlist"
    data-shortlist-link="https://shortlist.clutch.co"
    data-provider-id="907842"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="144790"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="110715"
          data-gtm_insight_id="811110"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS & Android Dev for Photo Integrated Map App</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 15, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              He was not just an order taker or simply responding to me, <b>but had ideas throughout the project for how we can make the app better</b>, how we could add certain functions, or how we might want to change this or that. Throughout the project, they were not just order takers. <b>They had ideas and pushed to make the product better.</b> They became partners with us.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/platform/110715"
            title="View PLATFORM Reviews"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Busy Human for exceeding their expectations, particularly in delivering impressive results. One client noted they aimed for 200 interactions but received 850, highlighting exceptional outcomes. The company&#39;s communication and responsiveness were frequently commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;Busy Human is by far the best in the way they communicate.&#39; Their expertise and proactive approach were also recognized, with clients expressing trust in their capabilities against larger competitors.
      </p>
    </div>

                <div class="provider__rating sg-rating rating-reviews">

                    <a

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Innovative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MyOxygen has received positive feedback regarding their innovative approach to problem-solving. Clients noted their ability to transform traditional processes into digital solutions, enhancing efficiency and usability. One client emphasized MyOxygen&#39;s responsiveness and forward-thinking nature, stating, &#39;They suggest some recoding or new functionality for the next iOS release.&#39; Another remarked on their commitment to knowledge sharing, which encourages innovation within the defense industry. Overall, the sentiment towards MyOxygen&#39;s innovation is highly favorable, highlighting their role as a catalyst for change.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="256377"

          data-gtm_review_id="33394"
          data-gtm_insight_id="836291"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Emergency Ambulance Service</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 6, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Weâ€™re the only ambulance service in the U.K. to have an app of this design. We are leading the way for U.K. ambulance services in terms of what we offer to our commanders. <b>Iâ€™ve always been impressed with their innovation, approachability, professionalism, flexibility, and ability to look forward</b>. Plus, theyâ€™re absolutely pleasant to deal with.
            </p>
          </div>

          data-gtm_insight_id="836291"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App for Engineering Support Services Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>

            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/myoxygen/145326"
            title="View MyOxygen Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

            >Debut Infotech is a mobile app development company specializing in iOS and Android app creation. Reviews demonstrate mixed feedback: approximately 60% of clients commend their professionalism, high-quality deliverables, and effective communication. However, around 40% express dissatisfaction with project delays, security concerns, and unmet design expectations. While some praise their agile and supportive approach, others highlight significant areas for improvement, particularly in communication and security.

        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express that Debut Infotech consistently exceeds expectations in various aspects of project delivery. One client noted the team&#39;s exceptional quality of deliverables, with a budget lower than anticipated and a high standard of communication. Their expertise in software development, coupled with a customer-focused approach and effective scrum principles, has resulted in a reliable and efficient partnership. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with the team&#39;s responsiveness and technical capabilities.
      </p>

            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
              data-gtm_insight_id="711531"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        â€”  Synodus built a digital banking platform for a fintech firm. The platform featured a current and savings account, a lending and borrowing system, and a payment system. They used APIs and cloud

            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Grey Chain"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Grey Chain"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Grey Chain is a proficient mobile app development company specializing in iOS and Android development, with a commendable reputation for providing scalable and innovative solutions. Across various reviews, 100% of respondents praised their project management, timely communication, and dedication, while 80% highlighted their ability to align with company values and deliver high-quality products. Grey Chain's commitment to client satisfaction and technical excellence is consistently emphasized in client feedback.

    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1172147"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1752838"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Techne. for their proactive approach, emphasizing their willingness to go beyond basic requirements. One client noted, &#34;Techne. is proactive, and their work aligns with who we are,&#34; highlighting their commitment to client success. The team is described as available around the clock, responding swiftly to inquiries. Another client appreciated how Techne. invests in their business, stating, &#34;Techne. works with us instead of working for us,&#34; reflecting a strong partnership and dedication.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1172147"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="285605"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1752838"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Android & iOS App Development for Education Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 30, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Techne. is <b>proactive</b>, and their work aligns with who we are. Techne. goes above and beyond to ensure we maintain our business and are set up for success. I can't see us working with any other vendor for development work. We've even had to stop Techne. at times because they wanted to start working on our idea, and we asked them to discuss it first.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/techne/285605"
            title="View Techne. Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Canadian Software Agency Inc for their proactive approach to project management. One client noted their &#39;remarkable responsiveness&#39; and timely delivery of items, which ensured a smooth workflow. Another highlighted their &#39;proactive&#39; responses to inquiries, demonstrating a commitment to client needs. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the agency&#39;s ability to anticipate and address client requirements effectively, contributing to successful project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall sentiment regarding timeliness in Five Pack&#39;s reviews is highly positive. Clients frequently commend their promptness and responsiveness. For instance, one client noted Five Pack&#39;s &#39;willingness to jump on any issue&#39; and described their support as &#39;very timely,&#39; ensuring that challenges were addressed quickly. Another client appreciated their &#39;flexibility and responsiveness,&#39; stating they felt prioritized. Additionally, a reviewer highlighted their effective communication and adherence to schedules, reinforcing the perception of Five Pack as a reliable partner in timely project execution.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback reflects a strong sentiment of exceeding expectations with Cubix. One client praised their ability to quickly grasp project requirements, resulting in a visually appealing and expertly integrated application. Another noted Cubix&#39;s commitment to delivering not just functionality but also aesthetic quality, emphasizing their exceptional partnership and dedication. Overall, clients highlighted seamless communication, thorough analysis of needs, and consistent updates as key strengths, showcasing Cubix as a reliable and impressive partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="109970"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="128057"
          data-gtm_insight_id="803953"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Android App Development for Gas Manufacturer and Supplier</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 8, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Apart from the visually pleasing interface, their front-end and back-end development was perfectly integrated. <b>They produced their best work and went beyond our expectations</b>. Seamless interaction and constant updates on development was the norm when we were working with them.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Flexible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have highlighted LNOKS&#39; notable flexibility in project management and communication.       </p>
    </div>

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 19, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What we especially appreciate about LNOKS is the lack of unnecessary middlemen.             </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed that Sudolabs consistently exceeds expectations in their project execution. Feedback highlights their exceptional product delivery, adherence to timelines, and budget management. One client praised the team&#39;s integrity and responsiveness, noting that they anticipated needs and demonstrated a deep care for the project. Overall, the sentiment reflects high satisfaction, with clients emphasizing efficiency, quality, and a commendable project management approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1412886"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="332831"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2026208"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Development & UX/UI Design for Healthcare Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 21, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The Sudo team operates with the highest integrity. They are efficient and reasonable in their estimations and work together in the interest of the client. Our experience with Project Manager was top-notch - always informative and frequently anticipated what we needed to know. They are highly responsive and show a deep level of care for each project. Collectively they have <b>exceeded expectations</b>!
            </p>
          </div>

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1412886"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="337397"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2026208"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Openness
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a highly positive sentiment regarding Positiva&#39;s openness throughout project collaboration. Feedback highlights their clear and straightforward approach from the outset, fostering effective communication via regular meetings. One client noted that the project manager and lead developer maintained direct communication, ensuring adaptability and responsiveness. Additionally, Positiva&#39;s willingness to provide suggestions for improvements based on prior experience further underscores their commitment to an open partnership.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Knowledgeable
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        ITgenerator is consistently recognized for its extensive knowledge in mobile app development. Clients noted their impressive technical expertise and ability to provide tailored solutions, as highlighted by a CEO who praised their in-depth knowledge of mobile technology, which significantly contributed to achieving project goals. Additionally, feedback from an administration manager emphasized ITgenerator&#39;s strong communication skills and project methodology, further reinforcing the overall sentiment of professionalism and competence.
      </p>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-gtm_provider_id="1880310"

              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Contic&#39;s engagement with Everyoneâ€™s Invited exceeded expectations, delivering a bespoke website that met all specified needs. Clients praised the excellent output, particularly the AI function for anonymity in submissions and the seamless donation integration. The teamâ€™s transparency and iterative communication were noted as impressive, with regular updates ensuring alignment. Overall, the client expressed complete satisfaction with the results and highlighted that the project management was effective and responsive to their requirements.
      </p>
    </div>

            <button

            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently noted SoftTeco&#39;s proactive approach as a significant strength. One client emphasized their commitment and ownership of projects, stating they &#39;kept pushing in an aggressive and proactive manner.&#39; Another highlighted that SoftTeco&#39;s team takes initiative and is responsive, contributing positively to the project. However, some feedback suggested that SoftTeco could have been more assertive in guiding the process initially. Overall, the sentiment around their proactivity is largely positive, reflecting a strong dedication to collaboration and problem-solving.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="27346"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="138952"
          data-gtm_insight_id="713721"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Development for DevOps Application</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 3, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I appreciate their commitment. They hold themselves accountable and truly take ownership of the work despite being an external partner. It would have been easier for them to just sit and wait until something happened, but theyâ€™ve kept pushing in an aggressive and <b>proactive manner</b>. The sense of dedication makes them feel like a real part of our team and business.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Ralabs for their proactive approach, highlighted by their effective communication and willingness to engage deeply with project requirements. One client noted their discipline and problem-solving skills, while another emphasized Ralabs&#39; commitment to pushing for product improvements and addressing needs promptly. The teamâ€™s readiness to assist and their ability to meet deadlines further underscore their proactive sentiment, making them a valued partner in project development.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="59334"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="126084"
          data-gtm_insight_id="786357"

The integration of the EmpowerLog platform significantly enhanced operational efficiency and employee satisfaction, showcasing Softexpoit&#39;s dedication to customer needs and investment value. Overall, clients view Softexpoit as a trusted partner, distinguishing themselves in an industry often marked by mediocrity.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently highlighted Fabrit Global&#39;s proactive approach, particularly their ability to quickly understand project requirements and propose tailored solutions. One client noted, &#39;Their involvement and ability to understand quickly what we wanted as a solution&#39; was impressive. Additionally, they appreciated the team&#39;s readiness to suggest multiple solutions based on their experience. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Fabrit&#39;s proactive engagement throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>

    <div data-new-summary="true" class="provider__description">
        <div class="provider__project-highlight-text provider__project-highlight-text--summary sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed">
            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Master of Code Global"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Master of Code Global"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  directory_profile project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Master of Code Global is a mobile app development company specializing in iOS and Android development, along with backend system implementation. They have received mixed reviews, with approximately 85% positive feedback highlighting their expertise, project management, and effective communication, while about 15% negative feedback criticized their pricing and transparency. Their clients often commend their ability to meet deadlines and deliver quality mobile applications.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="31324"

            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Master of Code Global has received consistently positive feedback regarding their proactive approach. Clients highlighted their effective communication, timely project delivery, and readiness to adapt to unexpected challenges. For instance, the CTO of Glia noted their proactive engagement with industry trends, while the Media and Consumer Engagement Manager of a luxury beauty brand praised their constant availability and supportive nature, emphasizing that their proactive attitude significantly contributed to the project&#39;s success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="31324"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="304728"
          data-gtm_insight_id="718808"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for CX Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 2, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Their project teams as well as individual masters that we engage with consistently deliver great solutions to our end customers or good work for our internal product development. They are <b>very proactive with industry trends</b>. For any organization seeking a reliable and highly skilled IT partner, I definitely recommend MOCG.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Chatbot Development for Tom Ford Beauty</h5>

              Their attention to detail, their <b>pro-activity and reactivity</b> as well as their high productivity. They were constantly available, consistent and supportive. It was such a pleasure working with them.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Devabit has consistently demonstrated a proactive approach in their engagements, as noted by clients who appreciated their ability to suggest optimal solutions that enhanced project outcomes. One client highlighted their flexibility and responsiveness to changes, while another praised their initiative in proposing improvements that aligned with business goals. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Devabit&#39;s proactive contributions, which have significantly impacted project success and client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="54555"

          data-gtm_review_id="133457"
          data-gtm_insight_id="734508"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Development of Entertainment Job Board & Social Feed</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 13, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They contributed great ideas for product design, as well as UI. They also <b>suggested features pertaining to the activity feed</b>, which was the turning point where this became more of a social app. I was also very impressed with their ability to incorporate business requirements. They really understood the product, as well as the business goals and model. It wasnâ€™t just about translating requirements into lines of code, but rather how it was going to function as a whole. They <b>brought up questions about the business rules whenever there were gaps</b>, and followed widely accepted development standards. They <b>took the initiative to design and implement the product</b> in a certain way.
            </p>
          </div>

A client praised their &#39;attention to detail&#39; and noted their willingness to thoroughly understand project requirements before implementation. Overall, the sentiment is highly favorable, with clients expressing confidence in the quality of work delivered.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="164932"
              data-gtm_insight_id="815888"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback regarding Locastic&#39;s proactive approach is overwhelmingly positive. Clients have noted their effective communication and timely delivery of project milestones. For instance, one client highlighted Locastic&#39;s flexibility in accommodating changes, stating they were &#39;highly effective&#39; and &#39;committed to meeting project timelines.&#39; Another client praised their proactive research and idea generation, asserting that Locastic provided &#39;creative ideas&#39; that were implemented successfully. This consistent feedback underscores Locastic&#39;s dedication to client satisfaction and project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="164932"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="269864"
          data-gtm_insight_id="815888"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Blockchain Development for Fundraising Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 19, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Locastic's project management was highly effective, marked by a <b>proactive approach to communication and adaptability</b>. They consistently delivered items on time, demonstrating a strong commitment to meeting project timelines. Their response to LitBit's needs was commendably flexible; they accommodated changes to already agreed project details with efficiency, ensuring that any delays were minimal and solely due to modifications requested by LitBit.
            </p>
          </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1114878"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1956242"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Proactive
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have noted Floating Dots&#39; proactive engagement in establishing clear communication and setting mutual expectations, which fostered a collaborative partnership. One client highlighted the importance of incorporating more proactive suggestions and innovative solutions to enhance collaboration further. Overall, the sentiment reflects a positive perception of Floating Dots&#39; proactive approach, although there is room for improvement in project management and timely updates.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1114878"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="294798"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1956242"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design & Development for Business Consulting Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 14, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              While our partner has consistently delivered high-quality work, there are a few areas for improvement. They could enhance their project management processes to ensure more timely updates and better alignment with our schedules. Additionally, incorporating more <b>proactive suggestions and innovative solutions</b> could further elevate our collaboration.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently report that Five exceeds expectations in delivering high-quality work and proactive solutions. One client noted they provided &#39;expert advice&#39; and identified critical improvements, while another highlighted their ability to deliver &#39;ahead of schedule and below budget.&#39; Feedback emphasizes Five&#39;s commitment to understanding client needs and their collaborative approach, with one client stating, &#39;They truly are a partner, not just a vendor,&#39; reflecting an overall sentiment of exceptional satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          data-gtm_insight_id="720392"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Strategic Consulting for Healthcare App</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 8, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They always provided what we were looking for and <b>often exceeded our expectations</b>. They provided the tools and expertise we needed to run the project successfully.

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that companyâ€™s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a companyâ€™s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>

        <h3 class="sg-article-card__title">Outsourcing App Development: What You Need to Know for a Successful Partnership in 2025</h3>

        </div>

</p>
        
        <div class="sg-article-card__tags">

<div class="sg-article-card" data-article-type="directory_articles">
    <a
        href="/resources/scaling-mobile-app-development-from-amit-samsukha"
        class="sg-article-card__link"
        title="Global Talent, Local Impact: Amit Samsukha on Scaling Mobile App Development"
        aria-label="Read the article 'Global Talent, Local Impact: Amit Samsukha on Scaling Mobile App Development'"
    ></a>
    <img
        rel="noreferrer"
        loading="lazy"
        property="image"

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a
